alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Fremont; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 07 at 5:27PM MDT until July 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Fremont County in central Colorado... Southern Teller County in central Colorado... Western El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 527 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Cripple Creek, or 22 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Victor around 535 PM MDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
